pages.title: Rerolling Vault Gear
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Artisan Scrolls$() may be used to reroll a Vault Gear Piece to its Unidentified state, giving you another chance at getting a desired outcome.

$(#033dfc)Artisan Scrolls$() may be found inside $(#033dfc)the Vault$() or crafted through using $(#033dfc)Fabrication Jewels$(), which require the player to have the $(#033dfc)Artisan$() Talent.$(br)By using a Fabrication Jewel on a Gear Piece, it has a chance to inherit one of the modifiers, and the Gear Type, only being able to be used for that Gear Piece.

pages.title: Using with Void Orbs
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Artisan Scrolls$() can be used in conjunction with Void Orbs, making the Void Orb target a certain modifier on the gear piece.
